cause.description:
Researchers have developed a mouse with Down Syndrome. This mouse is unraveling the mysteries and changing the landscape of genetic research in Down Syndrome.
The extra genes of the 21st chromosome have been mapped. The most crucial genes have been identified. Drugs to stop the expression need to be identified and carefully tested on DS mice.
Why hasn't it been done? .......
......not enough MICE!
By adopting 1 mouse today, you will ensure continued research
Go to www.adoptamouse.com to contribute
One mouse is only $21!
1. We believe that people with Down syndrome should have the opportunity to make choices affecting their lives.
cause.mission: The mission of DSRTF is to stimulate biomedical research that will accelerate the development of treatments to significantly improve cognition for individuals with Down syndrome.
cause.name: Adopt A Mouse For Down Syndrome
